name: Ligne de pain: The magic Show
name_original: Ligne de pain: The magic Show
description:
Controls:

use the Mouse Cursor to aim

w = up, s = down, a = left, d = right, (or you can use any of the arrow keys)

` = resets the game to the start

NOTE: if you get stuck on a room and the door isn't opening, step away and hit the " \ " key a couple times then go into the door.

Credits:

kaledrake: Kale DeYoung from MetroTree - Programming

asmoffet: Alex Moffet from Team Scratch - Art && Music
